name: Corporations with Cards
description:
The Basics

Corporations with Cards is best described by the title itself. You play as a corporation who uses cards to make decisions which affect the general public. Unfortunately, random decisions get made for you. You must maintain balance in society, or it will all come crashing down. It's up to you, tycoon.

Additional Instructions

For those of you who require additional help, here are the additional instructions: You play the first card by clicking the 1 key. You play the second card by clicking the 2 key. You play the third card by clicking the 3 key. The effects of a card are shown by its icons: the top meaning it will increase the corresponding stat by one, and the bottom meaning it will decrease the corresponding stat by one. Every turn, a random stat is decreased by one. You can know what stat was decreased by looking at the board in the center.
